name: Crown of Light
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Last Heroes and Midnight's Blessing.

In Beacon Town, special girls are trained from an early age to become Maidens. The only ones capable of wearing the Crown of Light, a relic from ancient times with great power, to be used for good, and for bad. Upon facing a threat from those known only as the Invaders, a conqueror's nation in expansion, the King sees the rise of a new Maiden as the only way to survive against this new enemy.

Beatrice has trained her whole life for this day, even if she never imagined it would really come. Brave, naive and determined, she will face the trials of her life to fulfill her destiny.

FEATURES


* Classic storyline
* Compelling party of characters
* Vast and varied world to explore. From forests, to caves, to towers, ruins and castles
* Mouse Support
* Up to 10 hours of gameplay
